products.title: Isla Ivory (Moisture Resistant)
products.description: Min width: 600mm max width: 5000mm min drop: 450mm max drop: 3500mm composition: pvc guarantee: 12 months stack: a choice of left, right or split. Controls: wand control attached to lead panel(s) to manually pull panels across. Headrail: robust white aluminium track, track depth varies depending on number of panels required. Fixings: top fix or face fix brackets. Buy made to measure isla ivory (moisture resistant) blackout panel blinds from soeasy blinds.
